review.author: DevOps (Codex)
review.findings: ERR-005 amplifier fixes: (1) watcher.js regex /logs[\\//]/ now matches Windows backslash paths â€” prevents log file writes from triggering watcher feedback loop. (2) daemon-handlers.js daemon-connected log replaced full existingTerminals serialization (including scrollback) with compact summary (count/alive/pane/sdk). Regression test added for both path formats. Verified by Ana against her original root cause analysis. 107 suites, 3257 tests passing.

_docs.rule: If change_type !== 'routine', reviewer model MUST differ from author model
_docs.workflow: 1. Author fills author+author_model+change_type. 2. Reviewer fills reviewer+model+result+findings. 3. Pre-commit checks result=approved and cross-model rule. 4. After commit, review.json is reset to pending.
